arts.ttl: Subs sink Stevenage as Crawley Town sense great escape
arts.sum: Murphy Cooper made an excellent stop to tip a curling Harry Forster effort wide in the opening 15 minutes and then the keeper needed to come scampering out to prevent a chance after Sweeney had given the ball away cheaply. Cooper also came rushing to meet Rushian Hepburn-Murphy when Crawley cut Boro open, a flick taking Lewis Freestone out of the equation, but although the clipped effort beat the keeper, it also drifted past the far post.

arts.ttl: We wanted to be in the FC25 game and we wanted to be in with Stevenage
arts.sum: "We wanted to be able to tell a story because we also believe that everybody is a gamer and it doesn't matter if you're playing Candy Crush or Scrabble or a casual game on a mobile device, or you're at ease on the console with EAFC or Call of Duty or Fortnite or different games like that. Knowing Stevenage were the right club for them came early, when they visited the opening game of this season at home to Shrewsbury Town.

arts.ttl: We walked in and everyone had the kit on - Xsolla delight at Stevenage partnership
arts.sum: "They want people to come and buy the kits and stuff of course, but it was really cool to see how fast it came together and how the fans organically jumped on." "Everybody's got behind our vision and our brand with the kits but then you see it in social media, you see the imagery, you see the graphics, you see what fans are sharing and it's all in their Xsolla kit.

Crawley were heading for a priceless victory when leading Bolton 3-1 on Saturday, until a late collapse saw them lose 4-3 and remain six points from safety. The Red Devils have not won at home since ...

arts.ttl: 'One step at a time' but Xsolla not ruling out further investment in Stevenage
arts.sum: League One is already home to Wrexham, who started the trend in celebrity owners when actor Ryan Reynolds and Rob McElhenney took over, and Birmingham City, who now boast seven-time Super Bowl winner Tom Brady as a minority investor. "It's like the spirit of fun and [great] to see that activity by these investors and these companies and the celebrities who have the social club and social channels.

arts.ttl: ‘Such a good player’ – Bolton Wanderers man hailed by Steven Schumacher after Crawley Town win
arts.sum: Bolton Wanderers midfielder Josh Sheehan has been praised by his new manager Steven Schumacher. Bolton Wanderers won 4-3… The post ‘Such a good player’ – Bolton Wanderers man hailed by Steven Schumacher after Crawley Town win appeared first on The72 - Football League News.

arts.ttl: Charlton Athletic v Stevenage League One player ratings
arts.sum: Stevenage were beaten 2-0 away to Charlton Athletic in League One and there were so many miss-steps, so many slack performances that you can't look past it. There were a few times he tracked back but the moment that sticks in my mind is when Eli King tried to slide the ball forward to him after 18 minutes and he was still pulling up his socks, 20 seconds after play had restarted.
